sense.gloss: to join (hands), to take (each other's hands)
to scramble for, to struggle for, to fight for
to pay attention to, to take notice of, to listen to, to concern oneself with, to deal with

sdata.j: あなたは、スミス↑氏↑↓し↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓を↑取↑↓|と↓り↑合↑↓あ↓う|べきです。
sdata.e: You should keep in touch with Mr Smith.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑望↑↓のぞ↓みは、↑世界中↑↓せかいじゅう↓の↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓がいつの↑日↑↓ひ↓か↑手↑↓て↓を↑取↑↓|と↓り↑合↑↓あ↓う|ことだ。
sdata.e: My wish is that one day all the people in world will go hand in hand.

sdata.j: あなたは、スミス↑氏↑↓し↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓を↑取↑↓|と↓り↑合↑↓あ↓う|べきです。
sdata.e: You should keep in touch with Mr. Smith.
